title: TFW the enemy spots you leaving their jungle

replies.body: I mean, this is the League of Legends Memes And Games Forum. Who here DOESN'T watch RWBY?

> [{quoted}](name=Spooks Are Loose,realm=NA,application-id=Ir7ZrJjF,discussion-id=812PZQog,comment-id=0003,timestamp=2017-07-05T20:32:49.027+0000)
>
> I mean, this is the League of Legends Memes And Games Forum. Who here DOESN'T watch RWBY?

I don't.

It's bad.

...
You have insulted the culture of my people.

As a recovered weeaboo I am proud to say this.

**_Filthy weeb trash smh_**
How much have you watched?
Meh only all 4 seasons, playing League to pass the time waiting for 5 {{item:3070}}

I was more asking the other guy because I'm used to people insulting shows and/or games without ever having watched/played them themselves.

I can't wait for the next season either though.  I also listen to the music to pass the time.  Volume 4 has some pretty good songs.

> [{quoted}](name=Votable Jester,realm=NA,application-id=Ir7ZrJjF,discussion-id=812PZQog,comment-id=00030000000100000000,timestamp=2017-07-06T00:08:36.654+0000)
>
> I was more asking the other guy because I'm used to people insulting shows and/or games without ever having watched/played them themselves.
> 
> I can't wait for the next season either though.  I also listen to the music to pass the time.  Volume 4 has some pretty good songs.

I've watched like 5 eps. I'm okay with the art style but the characters are so cliche that I really don't find it enjoyable.

the characters do get a lot of development. v1 isnt really a good standpoint to judge it from alone really. it was a bit awkward and v1 was almost purely character introduction. v3 is probably the hight of the show without a doubt and i would judge it by that if anything. i can understand skepticism because of the style, its even hard for me to rewtach v1. the style gets a lot better and refined later on and they even change softwares in v4 and its really good looking then. but the writing does get a lot better as it goes on, the backstories are actually pretty deep, same with the worldbuilding as well as the plot is decent as it gets farther along.

but yah show doesnt give a super strong good impression. but if you stuck with it it gets good.

> [{quoted}](name=MavenSong,realm=NA,application-id=Ir7ZrJjF,discussion-id=812PZQog,comment-id=0003000000010000000000000000,timestamp=2017-07-06T04:46:59.512+0000)
>
> the characters do get a lot of development. v1 isnt really a good standpoint to judge it from alone really. it was a bit awkward and v1 was almost purely character introduction. v3 is probably the hight of the show without a doubt and i would judge it by that if anything. i can understand skepticism because of the style, its even hard for me to rewtach v1. the style gets a lot better and refined later on and they even change softwares in v4 and its really good looking then. but the writing does get a lot better as it goes on, the backstories are actually pretty deep, same with the worldbuilding as well as the plot is decent as it gets farther along.
> 
> but yah show doesnt give a super strong good impression. but if you stuck with it it gets good.

Huh. Interesting. Idk man I didn't see much to it the first several eps so I dropped it. Idk.
to be fair a lot of the first season is a blit cliche so its understandable but it it does improve immensely.

> [{quoted}](name=MavenSong,realm=NA,application-id=Ir7ZrJjF,discussion-id=812PZQog,comment-id=000300000001000000000000000000010000,timestamp=2017-07-06T08:22:28.284+0000)
>
> to be fair a lot of the first season is a blit cliche so its understandable but it it does improve immensely.

Fair enough.
It should get even better as the seasons go on (considering just how many there should be).
from what ive heard its pretty hype

I do.

It's alright.
I haven't. I gave it about 10 seconds before the art style turned me away
I don't. I'm not interested in the art style, is all.
I tried to watch it but just couldn't because the art style.
